name: tarale
message:
Ads are OK, if they're well done. They're generally still ignored by people, but they can be added to sites in such a way that they don't overpower it.

This is where I'd love to show you stunning examples of how to do it right, and how to do it wrong, but it's 1.29am and I've a job lead to chase up in the morning, so you get an e-hug instead.

*e-hug*
